
四列数据分别是 Window ratio, ViewWidth, WindowWidth, ScreenWidth

MZ3 Wdp=360dp WxH=1080x1920 dpi=480
       930 -2   1080  930/1080=0.8611
0.822f 791 887  1080
0.850f 822 918  1080
0.910f 886 982  1080
0.920f 897 993  1080
0.950f 930 1026 1080
0.960f 940 1036 1080

MI6 Wdp=384dp WxH=1080x1920 dpi=480
       936 -2   1080  936/1080=0.8666
0.822f 797 887  1080
0.850f 828 918  1080
0.920f 903 993  1080
0.950f 936 1026 1080
0.960f 946 1036 1080

Y51A Wdp=360dp WxH=540x960 dpi=240
       465 -2   540  936/1080=0.8666
0.822f 395 443  540
0.850f 411 459  540
0.920f 448 496  540
0.950f 465 513  540
0.960f 470 518  540


设计样式 ViewWidth=888
888*0.822/791=0.9228
888*0.850/822=0.9182
888*0.920/897=0.9107
888*0.950/936=0.9013
888*0.960/946=0.9011

原生样式 ViewWidth=930
930*0.822/791=0.9664
930*0.850/822=0.9616

结论
Window ratio = 0.92f 符合设计样式
Window ratio = 0.95f 符合原生样式
